suggestedTasks.title: Add responsive width handling for /sessions page components
suggestedTasks.description: Implement responsive design guidelines for /sessions page layout to ensure consistent display across different screen sizes and devices. Review current width implementation and add media queries or flex/grid layouts to maintain readability and functionality. Focus on maintaining a clean, adaptive UI that works well on desktop and mobile views.
